CustomField.description: Leave blank to have Sales Process and Team View use the standard opportunity amount field. Set this to the API name of a custom opportunity field to have Sales Process and Team View refer to a custom amount field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Leave blank to have Playbook and Team View use the standard opportunity amount field. Set this to the API name of a custom opportunity field to have Playbook and Team View refer to a custom amount field.
CustomField.label: Opp Amount Field
